titleStmt.title: Micrologia Characters, or essayes, of persons, trades, and places, offered to the city and country. By R.M.
titleStmt.author: R. M., fl. 1629.

publicationStmt.publisher: By T.C[otes] for Michael Sparke, dwelling at the blue Bible in Greene Arbor,
